hero.title: TournaMate
hero.subtitle: The ultimate app to organize and manage your sports tournaments,

features.title: Why choose TournaMate?
features.subtitle: A complete solution to organize professional and amateur tournaments

creation.title: Simplified creation
creation.description: Create your tournaments in just a few clicks with our intuitive interface

multisports.title: Multi-sports
multisports.description: Manage all types of sports and competitions on a single platform

cta.title: Ready to organize your next tournament?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of organizers who trust TournaMate to manage their sports competitions.

forgotPassword.head: Reset your password
forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email address associated with your account and we will email you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.sucessMessage: Email with information has been sent!
forgotPassword.errorAuthProvider: This account is connected with an external service

login.head: Login
login.validateError: You must validate your account before logging in
login.googleRequestExpired: The request has expired. Try again

register.head: Register
register.name: Name
register.emailSent: A validation email for your account has been sent.

resetPassword.head: Create a new password
resetPassword.title: Create a new password
resetPassword.description: Your new password must be different from the previously used password.
resetPassword.sessionExpiredError: The session has expired, please try again

profileConnections.head: Connections
profileConnections.title: Connections
profileConnections.description: Here you will find connections with third-party services
profileConnections.cantDissociate: You cannot dissociate this service because you are connected with it
profileConnections.noExternalConection: No connection with a third-party service

profileDetails.title: My information

profileDetails.name: Name

profileSecurity.head: Security
profileSecurity.title: Security
profileSecurity.description: You can change your password here
profileSecurity.cantEdit: You cannot edit your information because you are connected with a third-party service

authLayout.signInDescription: Sign in with your Google account or email
authLayout.registerDescription: Enter your information to register on the platform

meLayout.head: My account
meLayout.description: Manage your account settings and set your email preferences.

userMenu.logoutTitle: Do you really want to log out?
userMenu.logoutDescription: Once logged out, you will no longer have access to the application

onboarding.welcome_description: To get started, you'll need to either join an existing organization or create a new one.

organization_explanation.title: What is an Organization?
organization_explanation.description: An organization is your tournament management hub. It groups all your tournaments, teams, and participants in one place. You can manage multiple tournaments under one organization and collaborate with other administrators.

join_card.title: Join Organization
join_card.subtitle: Join an existing organization that you've been invited to
join_card.description: Perfect if you've been invited by an administrator or need to join your team's organization.

create_card.title: Create Organization
create_card.subtitle: Start fresh by creating your own organization
create_card.description: Ideal if you're starting new or want to be the administrator of your own tournaments.

createOrganizationForm.title: Create Organization
createOrganizationForm.subtitle: Set up your new tournament organization

how_to_create.title: How to Create
how_to_create.description: Creating an organization makes you the administrator. You'll be able to create tournaments, invite other users, and manage all aspects of your competitive events. Choose a name that represents your group, team, or company.

createOrganizationForm.organization_name_help: This will be visible to all members and participants

joinOrganizationForm.title: Join Organization
joinOrganizationForm.subtitle: Enter the organization details provided by your administrator

how_to_join.title: How to Join
how_to_join.description: Contact your organization administrator to get the organization identification code. This unique code will allow you to join their organization and access all tournaments and events they manage.

joinOrganizationForm.organization_id_help: Ask your administrator for this unique identification code
